task.title: Creating a Donation Campaign Page
task.abstract: Donations are tracked and displayed via Campaign Pages. The Donation Campaign Page captures the revenue streams from donations.

step.cmd: Navigate to the donation Item record and the related Item Class record to select the Is Contribution checkboxes.
step.info: If applicable, select the Is Tax Deductible checkbox.
Confirm the Is Active checkbox is selected.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Campaign Pages tab in the eStore application and click New.
Enter the Campaign Name, identify the Store, Payment Gateway, and Theme from the lookups. Click Save.
Click the Campaign Page Builder button.
Drag-and-drop the Catalog Donation Display component from the sidebar to the main body of the page.
Select the catalog from the picklist. Click Save.
step.info: Configure the fields in the sidebar Settings to customize the Donation Campaign Page. Click Refresh to review.

step.cmd: Click Preview to inspect the page. Click Publish.
step.info: The Is Published checkbox is enabled upon returning to the campaign page record.

ul.li: Click the Go Back button to return to the Campaign Page record
Navigate to the Donation Campaign Page by clicking the Community URL link
